p: In the Treene, the share of species with decreasing responses was also high for the metrics that were predicted to change significantly (fl2 and ml16, Figure 4b,c, Figure S1b,c and Figure 5b,c,g,h). The magnitude of SR was also highest for these metrics compared to the rest of the metrics ( t test, p < .05). Furthermore, large decreasing trends were detected in response to the timing of high‐flow events (ta3).
